title: Mark Morris, Founder of The Mark Morris Dance Group
teaser: From Scratch Host Jessica Harris speaks with Mark Morris, the founder of the Mark Morris Dance Group. Harris also speaks with Elizabeth Cutler and Julie Rice, co-founders of SoulCycle.
contentencoded:
From Scratch Host Jessica Harris speaks with Mark Morris, the founder of the Mark Morris Dance Group. Harris also speaks with Elizabeth Cutler and Julie Rice, co-founders of SoulCycle.
